Class Task

java.lang.Object
  org.openlaszlo.lzproject.model.PersistenceBaseClass

public class Task
extends PersistenceBaseClass

Class Task is the representation of a task in the model.

Author:
raju

Method Detail

create

public RestServiceResult create(RestServiceResult result)
Create a new task in the database.

In case of failure the error is passed back contained in the RestServiceResult returned.

Parameters:
result - The RestServiceResult which will contain the localized messages and SQL state.
Returns:
The RestServiceResult containing the outcome of this operation.

deleteById

public RestServiceResult deleteById(RestServiceResult result)
Delete a task based on the id in the database.

In case of failure the error is passed back contained in the RestServiceResult returned.

Parameters:
result - The RestServiceResult which will contain the localized messages and SQL state.
Returns:
The RestServiceResult containing the outcome of this operation.
